headline: HII awarded task order valued at $182M for pilot training
summary: HII’s (HII) Mission Technologies division was awarded a task order valued at approximately $182M to provide logistics support for U.S. Air Force F-16 pilot training devices. Under the five-year task order, HII and subcontractor Trident Military Systems will perform engineering maintenance for the U.S. Air Force’s Mission Tactics Trainer Training System Support Center, which supports and sustains F-16 aircraft simulator systems in use by the U.S. Air National Guard, U.S. Air Force Reserve Command
